====================
HR Emergency Contact
====================

This module adds emergency contact information for employee

Installation
============

To install this module, you need to:

1.  Clone the branch 10.0 of the repository https://github.com/OCA/hr
2.  Add the path to this repository in your configuration (addons-path)
3.  Update the module list
4.  Go to menu *Setting -> Modules -> Local Modules*
5.  Search For *HR Emergency Contact*
6.  Install the module

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

1. Open employee data
2. Go to *Emergency Contact* tab
3. Add/select emergency contact

.. image:: https://odoo-community.org/website/image/ir.attachment/5784_f2813bd/datas
   :alt: Try me on Runbot
   :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/116/10.0
